Literature.Title: Cationic Net Charge and Counter Ion Type as Antimicrobial Activity Determinant Factors of Short Lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Greber KE, Dawgul M, Kamysz W, Sawicki W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis PCM 2118(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis PCM 2118(MBC=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MBC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MBC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=128µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris PCM 2668(MIC=>512µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris PCM 2668(MBC=>512µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=128µg/ml),Candida tropicalis PCM 2681(MIC=512µg/ml),Candida tropicalis PCM 2681(MFC=512µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 16404(MIC=128µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 16404(MFC=128µg/ml)
